did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Collection includes newsletters, publications, guest booklets, clippings, and a videotape, 2002-2004, primarily relating to the Sacred Stones project (construction of a Chapter House using 800 year-old stones from a Spanish monastery).

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: The Abbey of New Clairvaux is located on part of what was once Leland Stanford's Vina Ranch.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Collection includes newsletters, publications, guest booklets, clippings, and a videotape, 2002-2004, primarily relating to the Sacred Stones project (construction of a Chapter House using 800 year-old stones from a Spanish monastery).
